decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise than in complete accordance with the approved plans (as set out on page one of this decision notice).
For the avoidance of doubt and to ensure that the development is carried out as approved.

The use of the outbuilding (annexe) hereby permitted shall be used only for living accommodation as an integral part of the existing dwelling known as 74 Lake Avenue, Rainham and shall not be used as a separate unit of residential accommodation at any time.
The site is within an area where the Local Planning Authority consider that the sub-division of existing properties should not be permitted in the interests of amenity.

Statement Required by Article 35(2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management) Order 2015: No significant problems were identified during the consideration of the application, and therefore it has been determined in accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework.
description: Permanent residential use of existing outbuilding for use as a granny annexe
